body.p: Defining an IP range is mandatory in order to carry out either a network discovery or an SNMP inventory.

ul.li: Start of IP range : First IP address of the range
End of IP range: Last IP address of the range
Entity : Associate this IP range to an entity

body.note: An input validation is performed upon saving the IP range and any issue will result in an error message being displayed.

section.title: "Permanent task - discovery (SNMP)" tab
section.p: This tab is used to create a network discovery task easily.
Click on the "Create task easily" link to set up the task. Further configuration is required (see ).

section.title: "Permanent task - inventory (SNMP)" tab
section.p: This tab is used to create an inventory (SNMP) task easily.
Click on the "Create task easily" link to set up the task. Further configuration is required (see ).See section before Tab Permanent task - discovery (SNMP).

body.p: Both tabs contain a history providing complete logs for each task. The time-limit for storing these logs can be set in the setup options (see ).
